
```{r}
library(janitor)
library(tidyverse)

clean_names_2015 <- clean_names(raw_data_2015)
clean_names_2016 <- clean_names(raw_data_2016)
clean_names_2017 <- clean_names(raw_data_2017)
```

```{r}
longer_data_2015 <- clean_names_2015 %>% 
pivot_longer(-timestamp,names_to = "question", values_to = "answer") %>% 
    view()

longer_data_2016 <- clean_names_2016 %>% 
pivot_longer(-timestamp,names_to = "question", values_to = "answer") %>% 
    view()
```

```{r}
longer_data_2017 <- clean_names_2017 %>% 
filter((rowSums(is.na(clean_names_2017)) < 80)) %>% 
    select(internal_id:q11_day) %>% 
pivot_longer(-internal_id,names_to = "question", values_to = "answer") %>% 
    view()


```

```{r}
part_join <- full_join(longer_data_2015,longer_data_2016)

full_join <-    full_join(part_join,longer_data_2017) %>%
                select(-timestamp, -internal_id) %>% 
                view()
```
